item.title: SEAS Innovation Challenge - Start
item.description: We have been selected to receive a free Raspberry Pi kit for the SEAS Innovation challenge! The components of the kit can be found from the product site here. The goal is to have the Raspberry Pi configured for use with the robot (expect a guide for that soon) over winter break and for a basic roadmap to be made for where to go with the project. Stay tuned for updates on the progress.
